text: @Lorrain22492203 @LennaRocc And I hate it. I know someone in a kitchen of a restaurant near me has been diagnosed with COVID-19 and they have no intentions of telling customers. Cooking is the best way. But I've never made 3 meals, IN A ROW, in my life. I will be making meal 112 in a bit. Sucks!
